title: Treadwell logo typeface
content:
Hello all,

Can anyone please tell me which font is used in this logo? Thank you!

Regards,  
RC

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [05\_Treadwell\_Logo\_Perky\_Bros\_on\_BPO.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140122135602/http:/typophile.com/files/05_Treadwell_Logo_Perky_Bros_on_BPO.jpg) | 57.62 KB |
author: Calabaça

comments.content: Can't identify it but pretty convinced it's custom/customized. Some alternatives: [Abel](http://web.archive.org/web/20140122135602/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/madtype/abel-pro), [Mercado](http://web.archive.org/web/20140122135602/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/madtype/mercado), [Plexes](http://web.archive.org/web/20140122135602/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/plexespro)
Thanks a lot Ryuk! I couldn’t find it anywhere so I was already suspecting that it had to be a custom typeface!
